General.Name: Tree House Education & Accessories Limited
General.Description: Tree House Education & Accessories Limited provides educational services in India. The company offers a range of programs for children, including play group, nursery, junior kindergarten, senior kindergarten, day care services, teacher training courses, summer camps, and hobby classes. It also leases education infrastructure. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Mumbai, India.

5.Name: Mr. V.  Sridhar
5.Title: Chief Operating Officer of K-12 Schools
